OrgName: Coupons.com Incorporated (f/k/a and a/k/a Coupons, Inc.)
activities: Quotient Technology Inc. (formerly Coupons.com Incorporated) collects and stores personal information received from its subsidiaries Quotient Technology Limited and Shopmium S.A. according to its privacy policy located at http://www.quotient.com/privacy-policy/.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Quotient Technology Inc. (formerly Coupons.com Incorporated) is compliant with the TRUSTe Watchdog Complaint Resolution and Appeals Process for the handling of individual complaints and dispute resolution.
